tool.name: Report

param.name: outTable
param.dialogReference: The Results Table is the output table with all desired indicators.

param.name: siteNameField
param.dialogReference: A Field in the Results Table that contains site names for the report.

param.name: mxd
param.dialogReference: The Mapfile is an .mxd file with the report layout in it. The default is downloaded as part of the Toolset as “report_layout.mxd” in the same file directory as the tool.

param.name: outReport
param.dialogReference: The name of the new PDF Report file.

tool.summary: The Report Generation Tool uses the Results Table to create a PDF Report the same way the Full Indicator Assessment Tool uses its Output table, the difference is this tool lets the user specify the Mapfile (.mxd) to use for the report layout. The user can also specify a field in the table with site names.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: The Report Generation Tool uses the Results Table to create a PDF Report the same way the Full Indicator Assessment Tool uses its Output table, the difference is this tool lets the user specify the Mapfile (.mxd) to use for the report layout. The user can also specify a field in the table with site names.

searchKeys.keyword: Report Generation; RBI; Rapid Benefit Indicators; Ecosystem Services

EPA has relinquished control of the information and no longer has responsibility to protect the integrity, confidentiality, or availability of the information. Any reference to specific commercial products, processes, or services by service mark, trademark, manufacturer, or otherwise, does not constitute or imply their endorsement, recomendation or favoring by EPA. The EPA seal and logo shall not be used in any manner to imply endorsement of any commercial product or activity by EPA or the United States Government.
